scriptdbdata.Tables: VC3ETL.ExtractDatabase[Id='${extractdatabase}'],VC3ETL.FlatFileExtractDatabase[Id='${extractdatabase}'];dbo.InformExtractDatabase[Id='${extractdatabase}'];VC3ETL.FlatFileExtractTableType,VC3ETL.ExtractTable[ExtractDatabase='${extractdatabase}'],VC3ETL.FlatFileExtractTable[Id in (select ID from VC3ETL.ExtractTable where ExtractDatabase='${extractdatabase}')],VC3ETL.LoadTable[ExtractDatabase='${extractdatabase}'],VC3ETL.LoadColumn[LoadTable in (select ID from VC3ETL.LoadTable where ExtractDatabase='${extractdatabase}')]
scriptdbdata.PreBatchSQL: set nocount on;update VC3ETL.LoadTable set LastLoadDate = NULL where ExtractDatabase='${extractdatabase}';
